alert.note: Alert for Granite, Green, Ferris, Rattlesnake Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 26 at 2:27PM MDT until September 27 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 7 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 1 PM to 7 PM MDT Wednesday. the Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * IMPACTS: Low Humidities and Strong Gusty Winds will create erratic fire behavior. * AFFECTED AREA: In Central WY...Fire Weather Zone 289. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Fremont...Natrona. In Southwest WY...Sweetwater. * WIND: Southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 14 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now or are forecast to occur. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
